cmg.cnsim.engine.transaction

Interface ITxContainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Block, TransactionGroup, TransactionWorkload

    public interface ITxContainer
    Defines the main methods that a transaction containing type must include. Examples of ITxCointainers include transaction pools and blocks.
    Author:
    Sotirios Liaskos Enterprise Systems Group (ESG) @ York University

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds a transaction to the container
      boolean contains(int txID)
      Returns true if transaction with id txID is contained in the container.

      Returns true if Transaction t is contained in the container.
      void extractGroup(TransactionGroup g)
      Removes transactions from the group that are also contained in g.

      Total number of transactions in the container.

    • Method Detail

      • addTransaction

        void addTransaction(Transaction t)
        Adds a transaction to the container
        Parameters:
        t - The Transaction object to be added.

      • contains

        boolean contains(int txID)
        Returns true if transaction with id txID is contained in the container.
        Parameters:
        txID - The transaction ID in question
        Returns:
        true if t is in the container, false otherwise.

      • contains

        boolean contains(Transaction t)
        Returns true if Transaction t is contained in the container.
        Parameters:
        t - The Transaction object in question
        Returns:
        true if t is in the container, false otherwise.

      • extractGroup

        void extractGroup(TransactionGroup g)
        Removes transactions from the group that are also contained in g.
        Parameters:
        g - The TransactionGroup whose transactions are to be removed from the current group.

      • getContent

        Transaction[] getContent()
        Return the contents of the container
        Returns:
        An array of Transaction objects.

      • getCount

        int getCount()
        Total number of transactions in the container.
        Returns:
        The number of transactions.

      • getID

        int getID()
        Return the ID of the container
        Returns:
        The ID of the container

      • getSize

        float getSize()
        Total size in bytes contained in the container. TODO: Are these bytes?
        Returns:
        The number of bytes in teh container.

      • getValue

        float getValue()
        Total transaction value contained in the container.
        Returns:
        The total value of all transctions in the container.

      • printIDs

        java.lang.String printIDs(java.lang.String sep)
        Print the IDs of each transaction in the container.
        Parameters:
        sep - The separator between the IDs, e.g., ",".
        Returns:
        A string with the list of IDs.

      • removeNextTx

        Transaction removeNextTx()
        Remove the first transaction from the container and return a reference to the transaction just removed. Total size and value is updated.
        Returns:
        A reference to the transaction removed.

      • removeTxFromContainer

        void removeTxFromContainer(Transaction t)
        Removes transaction from the container
        Parameters:
        t - The Transaction object to be removed.
